getDestinationMappingParameters.description: Returns the URL parameters needed for running an application with destination mapping.

params.name: aBackendSystems
params.description: Array of backend systems from the run configurations, for example "[{'destinations': 'ELF','source': 'ABC'}]"

returns.description: Array of the URL parameters for for running an application with the destination backend instead of the source backend. For example [{"name":"hc_destmapping.ABC", "value":"ELF"}]
